text: Milena Alexeyevna Bykova (; born 9 January 1998) is a Russian snowboarder. She competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics, in parallel giant slalom. ==World Cup Podiums== BYKOVA Milena ===Individual podiums=== * 2 wins – (2 PGS) * 3 podiums – (3 PGS) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:95%;" !
